home.label: Home
home.title: New Shop
home.sub_title: Fresh new shops are joining every day! Check out the latest merchants in our community and discover exciting products, services, and local favorites.
home.sub_title_01: From family business to modern online sellers, we provide the right tools to help you manage, grow, and succeed in today’s digital marketplace.
home.sub_title_02: Connect real businesses and people to your store in 10 minutes!
home.sub_title_03: Connect all your sales channels to one store.
home.title_04: Create your dream store in 5 minutes
home.sub_title_04: Create your online store and start selling immediately.
home.sub_title_05: Make your sales easy and profitable with Pintel
home.title_06: Keep customers updated with your products
home.sub_title_06: Stay in touch and keep your customers engaged.
home.sub_title_07: You can download the Pintel app via the App Store or Google Play.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.find_the_right_price_for_your_business: Find the right price for your business.

food_shop_starter.label: Food Shop Starter
food_shop_starter.note: POS system, basic menu setup, QR code ordering, dine-in/takeaway orders

food_shop_business.label: Food Shop Business
food_shop_business.note: All Growth + Inventory management, supplier management, Expense, Basic Financial Report (IS)

food_shop_growth.label: Food Shop Growth
food_shop_growth.note: All Starter + Organization Unit (Group Business), Table management, delivery integration, basic reporting, promotions & loyalty

food_shop_enterprise.label: Food Shop Enterprise
food_shop_enterprise.note: All Business + Multi-branch dashboard, advanced analytics, API integration, custom branding

footer.address: House No. 466, Beton Street, Dei Thmey Village, Kouk Khleang Sangkat, Sen Sok Khan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
